players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: "I find it strange that Alice was the one who was killed on the first night. Let's keep a close eye on each other and make sure we don't let the mafia infiltrate our group."
Diana: "I agree with Charlie that we need to be vigilant and keep an eye on each other. Let's make sure we all trust one another and work together to uncover the mafia in our midst."

Charlie: "I'd like to propose that we vote for Bob tonight. I have a gut feeling that he might be the mafia in our midst, as he was rather quiet during the first discussion round and didn't share any valuable information."
You: "Charlie is the mafia, I'm sure of it. He's been acting suspiciously and his proposal to vote for me last night was just a ploy to throw us off his scent."
